## Counting distinct observations

```{r}
flights %>%
  count(...)
```


```{r}

```

## Heat map: destination by airline

```{r}
flights %>% 
  filter(...) %>%
  count(..., ...) %>%
  left_join(...) %>% 
  left_join(..., by = c("dest" = "faa")) %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_...(aes(..., ..., fill = ...)) +
```
